title: Artifact Core
description: Any file artifact associated with a clinical trial.

upload_placeholder.$comment: It might be something like random uuid or `upload_job_id` to help trace everything back.
upload_placeholder.description: A placeholder for when artifact file is being uploaded.

artifact_creator.description: The name of the center that created this artifact.

uploader.description: The name of the person uploading the artifact.

file_name.$comment: This supposedly get generated from 'gcs_uri_format' field in template schema def.
file_name.description: The name of the file with extension.

object_url.description: URL to artifact within Google Bucket.

uploaded_timestamp.description: Timestamp of when artifact was loaded into the system.

visible.description: Indicates if the artifact is visible.  If set to false, the artifact is effectively deleted.
